name: sqs-queue
description: SQS queue with secure defaults, optional DLQ, and visibility settings.

inputs.name: visibility_timeout_seconds
inputs.description: Seconds that a message is hidden after a consumer retrieves it.

inputs.name: message_retention_seconds
inputs.description: How long messages are retained (in seconds). Default 4 days.

inputs.name: max_message_size
inputs.description: Max message size in bytes (default 256 KB).

inputs.name: receive_wait_time_seconds
inputs.description: Long polling wait time in seconds.

inputs.name: dlq
inputs.type: object({ enabled = bool, queue_arn = string, max_receive_count = number })

inputs.name: fifo
inputs.description: Create a FIFO queue. If true, queue_name must end with .fifo.

inputs.name: tags
inputs.description: Tags to apply to the queue.
